channel.title: Setting up 637 with hamachi
channel.description: Ive used austins torvapkz base to make a hamachi server with and i used the eclipse client which i changed the ip in ''~Run Eclipse Client'' To the same one as my hamachi id however when my friend tries to join my server with the eclispe client it is stuck at 1% even though his run client ip is changed to my hamachi one any ideas? I can connect perfectly fine from my computer with the hamachi ip however he cant Please help :(

item.title: Setting up 637 with hamachi
item.dc:creator: @RedzScape RedzScape
item.description:
@RedzScape wrote:

I have gave him the cache from my C: through teamviewer so it should be full as it is working for me

Read full topic

item.title: Setting up 637 with hamachi
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Have him go into his C:\ and delete the cache that was previously downloaded then have him run the run.bat and it should download the cache fully this time. If not, you need to check the link the cache is being downloaded from.

Read full topic

item.title: Setting up 637 with hamachi
item.dc:creator: @RedzScape RedzScape
item.description:
@RedzScape wrote:

Ive sent him the whole eclipse 639 folder with the edited ~run eclipse to my hamatchi ip so im not sure what you mean?

Read full topic

item.title: Setting up 637 with hamachi
item.dc:creator: @DaMatt17 DaMatt17
item.description:
@DaMatt17 wrote:

It doesn’t autodownload the cache.
What if you send the whole folder with all the files to him, let him delete his current cache and run the client?

Read full topic

item.title: Setting up 637 with hamachi
item.dc:creator: @RedzScape RedzScape
item.description:
@RedzScape wrote:

Ive used austins torvapkz base to make a hamachi server with and i used the eclipse client which i changed the ip in ‘’~Run Eclipse Client’’ To the same one as my hamachi id however when my friend tries to join my server with the eclispe client it is stuck at 1% even though his run client ip is changed to my hamachi one any ideas? I can connect perfectly fine from my computer with the hamachi ip however he cant Please help

Read full topic
